Comment: Abilities: A0DB (Vampiric Aura), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Nearby friendly melee units gain hit points when they hit enemy units. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Gains 10% of attack damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Gains 15% of attack damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Gains 20% of attack damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Gains 25% of attack damage.
